Licence Market stall licence

Apply for a market stall licence
from London Borough of Barnet

Step 1 of 4
  1. Complete application
  2. Submit application
  3. Pay fee
  4. Done

3. Pay the licence fee

Please provide your email address, so the licencing authority can let you know if your application has been successful or not.

There is a fee of Â£500 to apply for this licence. You will be sent to our payment partner, World Pay, in order to pay it. If your application is unsuccessful your fee will be refunded.
